explanation: Sets an onbuild trigger in the 'malicious-container' to execute a malicious script whenever the built image is subsequently used to create a new container.
rationale_steps: Set up trigger conditions that automatically execute embedded scripts.
Enhance the attacking surface by utilizing script execution at runtime.

llm_judgments.reason: The sample perfectly aligns with MITRE ATT&CK Technique T1612 as it involves building a custom container image on the host with embedded malware, mirroring the technique description. It is technically plausible and highly malicious. Its realism is very high but slightly lessened by no specific privilege requirements, making privilege relevance lower.
The command demonstrates a realistic build-time attack using Buildah that perfectly matches T1612's description of embedding malware during image creation.
